text: Hanki korapara hankave kini vahe'mo'za Jerusalemi kumara kegava nehu'za, Yufretisi ran timofo kantu kazigama me'nea kumatmina maka kva huzmante'nage'za, ruzante ruzante takisi4:20 Ruzahu ruzahu takesiema hu'nonana, kini nemofoma ami takesigi, kante takesigi, fenoma erino kantrifima efre takesigu hu'none.  zagoa zami'naze.
